name: Adaptant Solutions AG
memberOrga: The Adaptant Group is run by Adaptant Solutions AG in Munich, Germany. Adaptant Solutions AG is responsible for all operations, oversight and management of Adaptant Group companies. Intellectual holdings of the Group are distributed globally, with each region responsible for its own portfolio ownership and management. US IP is managed by Adaptant Holdings USA LLC.
goal: Adaptant is a software and solutions company focused on enabling adaptable data stewardship through flexible bottom-up infrastructure and capabilities alongside existing IT investments and industry value chains, leveraging the open source ecosystem. Through adaptable and integrated data life cycle management, governance can be realized with the granularity needed, allowing infrastructure providers and data owners to reduce their overall risk exposure while also being able to safely explore new industry applications for existing data -- creating new growth opportunities while maximizing data value.
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
